channel.title: FemtoConf 2018 - March 2-4, 2018 - Darmstadt, Germany
channel.description:
Hello fellow bootstrappers!
@itengelhardt and I are organizing FemtoConf again. It's a tiny conference for bootstrappers in Darmstadt, Germany. It'll happen March 2-4, 2018.
Mike Taber, Claire Suellentrop, Aleth Gueguen, as well as an unannounced 4th speaker will be talking on Saturday. There'll be workshops on Sunday and plenty of time to meet old and new friends in between or during the social events in the evening.
Tickets are limited to 30 total and are available at an early bird discount over at http://femtoconf.com
We're looking forward to meeting you there :-)
Cheers,
Benedikt

item.title: FemtoConf 2018 - March 2-4, 2018 - Darmstadt, Germany
item.dc:creator: itengelhardt
item.description:
Hey folks.

I’d just love to throw in this recording from last year.
Mojca Mars delivered a great actionable talk on strategic growth with Facebook Ads:

I hope that helps those of you on the fence about attending
